m_szDocTitle: Hydrogen Fuel Cells Less Likely Than Electric Cars: Daimler CEO Zetsche
m_szDocSumamry: Hydrogen Fuel Cells Less Likely Than Electric Cars: Daimler CEO Zetsche Email This Page To (separate emails with commas) Message (optional) Your email was sent successfully. Close 4,550 views Feb 23, 2016 Dieter Zetsche Enlarge Photo There's an emerging rivalry between two different technologies for zero-emission transportation: battery-electric cars and hydrogen fuel-cell vehicles. Within the auto industry, each powertrain has its strong advocates. Some carmakers are focusing on either fuel cells or batteries, to the exclusion of the other. Hydrogen fuel cells are backed most notably by Toyot
